page.title: 06Brains' Foods. Kingswood.
page.content: {Brains' factory}was built between 1900 and 1910. It was extended in 1973 and nearly doubled in size. The factory belongs to an American firm called{Kraft Europe.}The factory earns around Â£20 million per annum. It has a floor area of 36424 square metres. The{products}are{frozen foods, sausage rolls, pies, pasties and faggots. The main{ingredients}are flour, spices, meat and dried vegetables. The only fresh vegetables are onions. To avoid contamination the electically powered machines are specially made. The{working hours}of the staff are in three shifts: 8am-12 noon, 1pm-5pm, and 6pm-10pm. They make more than a million sausage rolls each day. The{women workers}are not allowed to wear jewellery, heavy make-up or high-heeled shoes whilst working near food.
